title:
Whatever became of the big clock that was between ACL office building B and C

at the beginning of the concourse at union station ? I worked in the Roadmaster\'s office in 1944 and remember it well.. I also have a picture of it on the ground after it was taken down when the concourse was demolished
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8447  (And thanks for your help on the question about the Blue Top.)
